Instance.description: Global tuning parameters for sim lighting.

Tunable.name: AmbientDimming
Tunable.description: Decreases ambient by amount of direct lighting from key/fill to balance overall intensity.

Tunable.name: AmbientFromLightsFactor
Tunable.description: Controls what fraction of the key light to add to ambient.

Tunable.name: AmbientFromOutdoorsFactor
Tunable.description: Controls what fraction of the outdoor ambient color to add to ambient.

Tunable.name: AmbientFromRoomFactor
Tunable.description: Controls what fraction of the room ambient color to add to ambient.

Tunable.name: AmbientFromSunFactor
Tunable.description: Controls what fraction of the sun directional color to add to ambient.

Tunable.name: AmbientIntensityMax
Tunable.description: Upper value for vertical gradient applied to ambient term.

Tunable.name: AmbientIntensityMin
Tunable.description: Lower value for vertical gradient applied to ambient term.

Tunable.name: BBBAmbientIntensityMax
Tunable.description: Intensity of BBB ambient light, at the top of the sim.

Tunable.name: BBBAmbientIntensityMin
Tunable.description: Intensity of BBB ambient light, at the bottom of the sim.

TunableTuple.name: BBBBaseColor
TunableTuple.description: Sets base BBB color for all BBB lighting.

Tunable.name: BBBEnableCustom
Tunable.description: Enables sim-specific BBB. This disables influence from the object (light rig) BBB settings.

Tunable.name: BBBFadeLumaEnd
Tunable.description: Approximate luma to end fading out BBB; should be greater than the start value. BBB is inactive above this point.

Tunable.name: BBBFadeLumaStart
Tunable.description: Approximate luma to start fading out BBB; should be less than the end value. Below this point the sim gets full BBB.

Tunable.name: BBBFadeSaturation
Tunable.description: Enables desaturation as BBB fades out to avoid mixing bluish BBB colors with reddish normal light.

Tunable.name: BBBFillIntensity
Tunable.description: Intensity of the BBB fill light.

Tunable.name: BBBKeyIntensity
Tunable.description: Intensity of the BBB key light.

Tunable.name: BBBMaxLumaDelta
Tunable.description: Max amount of luma per second that BBB can change.

Tunable.name: DistMax
Tunable.description: Maximum distance in meters for the distance-based falloff ramp for light contribution. Lights outside of this radius contribute no light.

Tunable.name: DistMin
Tunable.description: Minimum distance in meters for the distance-based falloff ramp for light contribution. Lights within this radius contribute at full intensity.

Tunable.name: FadeMax
Tunable.description: Maximum angle in degrees for angle-based falloff for light contribution. Once the angle between a key/fill p-light and a source light reaches this threshold, the source light is attenuated to zero.

Tunable.name: FadeMin
Tunable.description: Minimum angle in degrees for angle-based falloff for light contribution. Once the angle between a key/fill p-light and a source light is above the threshold, the source light starts attenuating.

Tunable.name: FadePower
Tunable.description: Controls the sharpness of falloff as the angle between a key/fill p-light and a source light increases. 1.0 gives a linear ramp, <1 gives softer falloff, >1 gives sharper falloff.

Tunable.name: FillAngle
Tunable.description: Yaw of the fill light in view space.

Tunable.name: FillClamp
Tunable.description: Luminance limit for fill light (limit for max of R/G/B).

TunableTuple.name: FillFloor
TunableTuple.description: Hard minimum R/G/B color value for fill light; the fill light is raised to this color value if it falls below.

Tunable.name: FillHeight
Tunable.description: Sets the relative height of the fill light, in meters, from the rig origin.

Tunable.name: FillIntensity
Tunable.description: Intensity multiplier for fill light; amplifies or attenuates all contributions to the fill light, before the floor/clamp.

Tunable.name: FillMin
Tunable.description: Minimum clamp for angle-based falloff (0-1) (applied for each source light).

TunableTuple.name: FillPedestal
TunableTuple.description: Additional colored light to add onto the fill light, after all source lights and min/maxes have been applied.

Tunable.name: FillSaturation
Tunable.description: Increases or decreases the saturation of the source light contributions to the fill light color.

Tunable.name: KeyAngle
Tunable.description: Yaw of the key light in view space.

Tunable.name: KeyClamp
Tunable.description: Luminance limit for key light (limit for max of R/G/B).

TunableTuple.name: KeyFloor
TunableTuple.description: Hard minimum R/G/B color value for key light; the key light is raised to this color value if it falls below.

Tunable.name: KeyHeight
Tunable.description: Sets the relative height of the key light, in meters, from the rig origin.

Tunable.name: KeyIntensity
Tunable.description: Intensity multiplier for key light; amplifies or attenuates all contributions to the key light, before the floor/clamp.

Tunable.name: KeyMin
Tunable.description: Minimum clamp for angle-based falloff (0-1) (applied for each source light).

TunableTuple.name: KeyPedestal
TunableTuple.description: Additional colored light to add onto the key light, after all source lights and min/maxes have been applied.

Tunable.name: KeySaturation
Tunable.description: Increases or decreases the saturation of the source light contributions to the key light color.

Tunable.name: LightBaseHeight
Tunable.description: Sets the height above the sim's root locator, in meters, to use as the origin of the perfect light rig.

Tunable.name: PointLightExtrusionSkySide
Tunable.description: Extend a Window point light by this times window height on the sky side.

Tunable.name: PointLightExtrusionSunSide
Tunable.description: Extend a Window point light by this times window height on the sun side.

Tunable.name: PointLightFraction
Tunable.description: Sets the fraction of the four brightest lights that will be diverted to point lights.

Tunable.name: PointLightMaxLumaDecrease
Tunable.description: Sets the amount of luma per second that can be removed from a point light (2 => white to black in 1/2 seconds, 3 => 1/3 etc.).

Tunable.name: PointLightMaxLumaIncrease
Tunable.description: Sets the amount of luma per second that can be added to a point light (2 => black to white in 1/2 seconds, 3=>1/3 etc.).

Tunable.name: Rim1Angle
Tunable.description: Yaw angle of first rim light, in degrees.

Tunable.name: Rim1Height
Tunable.description: Relative height of first rim light, in meters.

Tunable.name: Rim1Intensity
Tunable.description: Intensity of first rim light.

Tunable.name: Rim1MaxRatio
Tunable.description: Limits rim 1 contribution as a ratio of key+fill+ambient light. Zero disables limit.

Tunable.name: Rim2Angle
Tunable.description: Yaw angle of second rim light, in degrees.

Tunable.name: Rim2Height
Tunable.description: Relative height of the second rim light, in meters.

Tunable.name: Rim2Intensity
Tunable.description: Intensity of second rim light.

Tunable.name: Rim2MaxRatio
Tunable.description: Limits rim 2 contribution as a ratio of key+fill+ambient light. Zero disables limit.

Tunable.name: SourceClamp
Tunable.description: Limits the intensity of all non-sun source lights for perfect light computations (post-scale).

Tunable.name: SourceScale
Tunable.description: Scales all non-sun source light inputs up or down; this is an alternative to scaling the key/fill clamps and intensities.

Tunable.name: SunClamp
Tunable.description: Maximum luminance value for the sun when lighting sims.

Tunable.name: SunSaturation
Tunable.description: Saturation factor to apply specifically only to the sun.

Tunable.name: SunScale
Tunable.description: Scale factor to apply specifically only to the sun.
